episodes.title: 💜 Breaking the Chains: Escaping the Grip of Cults and Reclaiming Your Freedom
episodes.description:
Women Atheists UNLOAD | Beyond the Cult: Strategies for Healing and Rebuilding Your Life

#WomenAtheistsUnload #skeptichaven #Secularhumanism #atheism #Christianity #leavingreligouscults #JanjaLalich 

✔️ Janja Lalich is a renowned author, researcher, and educator who specializes in the study of cults, extremist groups, and their impact on individuals and society. She has been active in the field for over three decades and has written extensively on the subject. Lalich is a former member of a political cult and has used her personal experience to inform her work. She is widely recognized as an expert in her field and has consulted with various law enforcement agencies, government officials, and media outlets. Lalich's work sheds light on the inner workings of these groups, their recruitment tactics, and the psychological impact on their members. Her expertise has been instrumental in helping individuals and families affected by cults, as well as in developing strategies to combat the harmful influence of these groups

✔️ Janja Lalich:
